statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={3.2} , \displaystyle{b}={6.4}, \displaystyle{c}={9.4}, and \displaystyle{d}={11.1}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={7.6}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
